verses.text: MOU ifi talupite ‘i Saione, ‘Io, ‘ai ke maongo atu ‘i hoku mo‘unga tapu; Ke tete ‘a e nofo fonua kotoa pē: He ‘oku hoko mai ‘a e ‘Aho ‘o e ‘Eiki, Seuke, ‘oku ofi.

Ko e ‘aho po‘uli ko e kaupō‘uli, ko e ‘aho ‘o e loa mo e po‘uli matolu, ko e hangē ena ko e mafoa ‘a e ‘ata ‘i he funga mo‘unga. Ko e kakai lahi mo kaukaua ena, te‘eki hano tatau talu mei mu‘a ‘i mu‘a, pea hili ia ‘e ‘ikai toe ‘i ai, ‘o laui to‘utangata.

‘Oku tāimu‘a ki ai ha afi keina; Pea ‘oku ‘emo mei mui ha afi ulo: Ko e fonua ‘i he‘ene a‘u ki ai ‘Oku hangē ko e ngouetapu ‘i ‘Īteni, Ka ‘i he‘ene tuku ki mui Ko e toafa mamate; Pea na‘a mo e me‘a na‘e holataki Na‘e ‘ikai ma‘u.
Ko honau fōtunga na‘e hangē ko e fōtunga ‘o e hoosi; pea hangē ko e tau heka hoosi na‘e pehē ‘enau lele.

‘Oku ongoonga‘a ‘enau fehopokaki ‘o hangē ko e longoa‘a ‘o e ngaahi sāliote ‘i he funga mo‘unga, hangē ko e longoa‘a ‘o e ulo ‘o e afi ‘oku keina ‘a e veve, ko e longoa‘a tofu pē ‘o ha kakai kaukaua kuo ‘osi fakatē ki he tau.
He‘enau hā mai ‘oku toutou ‘a e ngaahi kakai: ‘Oku mole ‘a e melo mei he mata kotoa.
Ko ‘enau ‘oho ‘oku hangē ha kau helo; ‘Oku nau kaka ‘i he ‘ā hangē ha tau; Pea ‘oku nau fou atu takitaha ‘i hono ‘alunga, Pea ‘oku ‘ikai te nau afe mei honau ‘otu.
Pea ‘oku ‘ikai ke fepaki ha taha mo ha taha; ‘Oku ‘alu ‘a e sōtia takitaha ‘i hono laine: Pea ‘i he‘enau tū‘ulu ki he mahafu, ‘Oku ‘ikai motu ai ‘enau ‘alu.
‘Oku nau lele holo ‘i he kolo; ‘Oku nau lele ‘i he ‘ā; ‘Oku nau kaka ki he ngaahi fale; ‘Oku nau hū he ngaahi tupa hangē ha kaiha‘a.
He‘enau hā, ‘oku tete ‘a e fonua; ‘Oku ngāue ‘a langi; ‘Oku fakapo‘uli ‘a e la‘ā mo e māhina, Pea ‘oku tuku ‘e he ngaahi fetu‘u ‘enau ulo.

Pea ‘oku tukuna atu ‘e Sihova hono le‘o ‘i he ‘ao ‘o ‘ene tau; he ‘oku lahi ‘aupito ‘ene ‘apitanga tau: pea ‘oku kaukaua ‘a ia ‘oku fakaai ‘ene folofola, Seuke, ko e ‘aho lahi mo fakalilifu ‘aupito ‘a e ‘Aho ‘o e ‘Eiki; pea ko hai te ne matu‘uaki?
Pea na‘a mo e taimi ni–ko Sihova ia mei he Ta‘ehāmai–mou mātu‘aki tafoki kiate au ‘aki ‘a e kotoa ‘o homou loto, pea ‘aki ‘a e ‘aukai, pea ‘aki ‘a e tangi, pea ‘aki ‘a e tangilāulau:
Pea hae homou loto, ‘o ‘ikai ko homou kofu, pea mou foki kia Sihova ko homou ‘Otua; he ko e Angalelei ia mo e ‘Alo‘ofa, Tuai-ki-he-houhau, pea Fonu-‘i-he-kelesi, pea ‘oku ne momou ‘i he kovi.
Na‘e ‘ilo ‘e hai te ne tafoki nai, ‘o momou, pea te ne tuku hifo ha tāpuaki ‘i he‘ene ‘alu, ‘o ai ha feilaulau-me‘akai mo ha feilaulau-me‘ainu ma‘a Sihova ko homou ‘Otua.
Mou ifi talupite ‘i Saione, Tu‘utu‘uni ha ‘aukai tapu, Fanongonongo ha tapu ngāue;
Fakatefua mai ‘a e kakai, Tu‘utu‘uni ha fakataha fakasiasi; Tānaki ‘a mātu‘a, Fakatefua mai ‘a e tamaiki mo e kei huhu: Ke ha‘u ‘a e tangata ta‘ane mei hono loki, Mo e ta‘ahine mei hono leke.

Ke tangi ‘a e kau taula‘eiki, ‘A e kau tauhi ‘o Sihova, ‘I he vaha‘a ‘o e falehū‘anga mo e ‘ōlita; Pea ke nau pehē: ‘E Sihova, ‘alo‘ofa mai ki ho kakai, Pea ‘Oua ‘e tuku ho tofi‘a ko e manukia, Ke taungalea ‘iate kinautolu ‘a e hīteni: Koe‘uma‘ā ke fai ha lau ‘i he ngaahi kakai, “Koma‘ā honau ‘Otua?”
Toki kamata fua‘a ‘a Sihova koe‘uhi ko hono fonua, ‘O ne manava‘ofa ki hono kakai.
Pea tali ‘e Sihova, ‘o ne folofola ki hono kakai, Ko au eni ‘oku ou tuku atu ‘a e uite, mo e uaine fo‘ou, mo e lolo, ke mou mākona ai; pea ‘e ‘ikai te u toe tuku kimoutolu ke manukia ‘e he hīteni:

Pea te u ‘ave ke mama‘o meiate kimoutolu ‘a e ha‘a tokelau na. Pea te u fakateka ia ki ha fonua honge vai mo lala, ko hono takitau ki he tahi hahake, pea ko hono tukutau ki he tahi hihifo; pea ‘e taufa mai hono namukū, pea ‘e ‘alu hake hono ‘elo, he kuo ne fai me‘a lalahi.
Kelekele, ‘oua ‘e manavahē; tome‘e mo fakafiefia; he ‘oku fai me‘a lalahi ‘e Sihova.
Fanga manu ‘o e vao, ‘oua ‘e manavahē; he ‘oku fisiki mai ‘a e ngaahi kaikai‘anga ‘i he toafa; seuke, ‘oku fakatupu fua ‘a e ‘akau, ‘oku tukuna atu ‘e he fiki mo e vaine ‘enau mālohi.

Mo si‘i hako ‘o Saione, mou tome‘e mo fakafiefia ‘ia Sihova ko homou ‘Otua: he ‘oku ne ‘atu kiate kimoutolu ‘a Vaimu‘a ‘i he totonu, ‘io, te ne hifo kiate kimoutolu ‘a e ‘uha, ‘a Vaimu‘a mo Vaimui he ‘uluaki māhina.
Pea ‘e fonu uite ‘a e ngaahi ‘au‘au‘anga, pea ‘e fonu mahua ‘a e ngaahi sima ‘i he uaine mo e lolo.
Pea te u fakaai kiate kimoutolu ‘a e ngaahi ta‘u na‘e keina ai ‘e he he‘e-fakafolau, ‘a e he‘e-‘emo, mo e he‘e-fohi, mo e he‘e-‘ola, ‘a ‘eku fu‘u hōsitē na‘a ku fekau atu kiate kimoutolu.
Pea te mou kai, kai, ‘o mākona, pea te mou fakamālō‘ia ‘a e Huafa ‘o Sihova ko homou ‘Otua, hono kuo fakaofo ‘ene feangai mo kimoutolu: pea ‘e ‘ikai fakamaa‘i hoku kakai ‘o ta‘engata.
Pea te mou ‘ilo ‘oku ou lotolotoi ‘a ‘Isileli ‘e au, pea ko au Sihova ia ‘a homou ‘Otua, pea ‘oku ‘ikai mo ha taha; pea ‘e ‘ikai fakamaa‘i hoku kakai ‘o ta‘engata.

Pea ‘e hoko ‘i he kuonga ki mui, te u lilingi hoku laumālie ki he kakano kotoa; pea ‘e fai palofisai ‘e homou ngaahi foha mo homou ngaahi ‘ōfefine, ko e mātu‘a ‘omoutolu te nau fa‘a misi, ko e kau talavou ‘omoutolu te nau mata vīsone:
‘io, na‘a mo e kau tamaio‘eiki mo e kau kaunanga te u lilingi hoku Laumālie kiate kinautolu ‘i he kuonga ko ia.
Pea te u ‘ai ‘a e ngaahi me‘a fakaofo ‘i he langi pea ‘i māmani, ko e toto, mo e afi, mo e ngaahi pou kohu.
‘E liliu ‘a e la‘ā ‘o po‘uli, mo e māhina ‘o toto, ‘i he tei hoko ‘a e ‘Aho ‘o Sihova, ‘a e ‘aho lahi mo fakalilifu.

Pea ‘e hoko ‘o pehē, ko ia ‘oku tautapa ki he huafa ‘o Sihova ‘e fakahaofi: he ai ha kau hao ‘i Mo‘unga Saione mo Selusalema, ‘o hangē ko e folofola ‘a Sihova, pea ‘e ‘i he kau toe ‘a kinautolu ‘oku ui ‘e Sihova.
